Cause of the Smell: The length of the statement "return tasks.stream().filter(task -> Instant.ofEpochMilli(task.getDueDate().getTime()).atZone(ZoneId.systemDefault()).toLocalDate().isEqual(today)).toList();" is 157.

Cause of the Smell: The length of the statement "return tasks.stream().filter(task -> Instant.ofEpochMilli(task.getDueDate().getTime()).atZone(ZoneId.systemDefault()).toLocalDate().isBefore(today)).toList();" is 158.
